plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Compose a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. The note should be one paragraph and written in the style of lecture notes, including relevant details on their performance characteristics as understood in 2025.
Write the composed note onto a Notion page named 'quantum' using the note text from the previous step.

inputs.name: $note_text
inputs.description: The composed note on fast quantum computers in lecture note style
